commit.message:
Fix suggestions given mulitple bad lifetimes

When given multiple lifetimes prior to type parameters in generic
parameters, do not ICE and print the correct suggestion.

Fix suggestions given mulitple bad lifetimes

When given multiple lifetimes prior to type parameters in generic
parameters, do not ICE and print the correct suggestion.
